original_title: Buster Makes Room for His Mama at the Bargain Counter
overview: Scene III of the Buster Brown Series. Shows a bargain counter in a department store and a large gathering of women examining goods. It is a special sale, and a great deal of interest is shown by the ladies, who jostle and crowd each other to secure the choicest bargains. Mrs. Brown enters, accompanied by Buster and Tige. Mrs. Brown is unable to get near the counter and is in despair.
title: Buster Makes Room for His Mama at the Bargain Counter
